AquaticMod:AlgaeBloom.NAME: Algae Bloom
AquaticMod:AlgaeBloom.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain [B]. NL Add a Slimed to the bottom of your NL draw pile.
AquaticMod:AlgaeBloom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain [B]. NL Add a Slimed NL into your hand.

AquaticMod:Ahoy.NAME: Ahoy
AquaticMod:Ahoy.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL The next time you shuffle your draw pile, lose !M! Strength.

AquaticMod:Avidity.NAME: Avidity
AquaticMod:Avidity.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Swim, trigger it.
AquaticMod:Avidity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you gain Swim, trigger it.

AquaticMod:Bacteria.NAME: Bacteria
AquaticMod:Bacteria.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Exhaust a card, you may Exhaust another card from your hand.

AquaticMod:BarnacleBlitz.NAME: Barnacle Blitz
AquaticMod:BarnacleBlitz.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! Cards. NL Gain !M! Swim. NL Freeze this card.

AquaticMod:BlownOut.NAME: Blown Out
AquaticMod:BlownOut.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Depth Charges to the bottom of your draw pile.

AquaticMod:BombsAway.NAME: Bombs Away
AquaticMod:BombsAway.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a Depth Charge+ to the bottom of your draw pile.
AquaticMod:BombsAway.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a Depth Charge+ to the bottom of your draw pile.

AquaticMod:BrightScales.NAME: Bright Scales
AquaticMod:BrightScales.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your Swim +5.
AquaticMod:BrightScales.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your Swim +8.

AquaticMod:BrineBlast.NAME: Brine Blast
AquaticMod:BrineBlast.DESCRIPTION: If the target is at or below 50% HP, NL apply !M! Weak. NL Deal !D! damage.

AquaticMod:Bubble.NAME: Bubble
AquaticMod:Bubble.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Swim. NL Exhaust.

AquaticMod:Cephalopod.NAME: Cephalopod
AquaticMod:Cephalopod.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you end your turn Entangled, NL gain !M! Strength and Dexterity.

AquaticMod:Clone.NAME: Clone
AquaticMod:Clone.DESCRIPTION: Pick a card from your hand. Put it and a copy of it on the bottom of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

AquaticMod:Chitin.NAME: Chitin
AquaticMod:Chitin.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase this card's Block by !M! this combat.

AquaticMod:Cloister.NAME: Cloister
AquaticMod:Cloister.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If Entangled, NL gain !B! additional Block.

AquaticMod:Compression.NAME: Compression
AquaticMod:Compression.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for each card in your hand. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

AquaticMod:CoralScales.NAME: Coral Scales
AquaticMod:CoralScales.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 Thorns for ALL your cards containing "Scales".

AquaticMod:DarkWaters.NAME: Dark Waters
AquaticMod:DarkWaters.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Swim. NL Gain Entangled. NL Exhaust.

AquaticMod:Demolish.NAME: Demolish
AquaticMod:Demolish.DESCRIPTION: Double the target's Mines. NL Deal !D! damage.

AquaticMod:Deploy.NAME: Deploy
AquaticMod:Deploy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Mines to ALL enemies.

AquaticMod:DepthCharge.NAME: Depth Charge
AquaticMod:DepthCharge.DESCRIPTION: Deep. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Exhaust.

AquaticMod:Detonate.NAME: Detonate
AquaticMod:Detonate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Mines do not damage you from this Attack.
AquaticMod:Detonate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Mines do not damage you from this Attack.

AquaticMod:Dive.NAME: Dive
AquaticMod:Dive.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Put a Deep card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

AquaticMod:DrowningPool.NAME: Drowning Pool
AquaticMod:DrowningPool.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Deep card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

AquaticMod:EggClutch.NAME: Egg Clutch
AquaticMod:EggClutch.DESCRIPTION: Deep. NL At the end of 2 turns, gain !M! Strength and Dexterity.

AquaticMod:FeedingFrenzy.NAME: Feeding Frenzy
AquaticMod:FeedingFrenzy.DESCRIPTION: Deep. NL Deal !D! damage. NL For every !M! cards in your deck (not draw pile), heal 1 HP. NL Exhaust.

AquaticMod:FieryFish.NAME: Fiery Fish
AquaticMod:FieryFish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to NL ALL enemies twice. NL Unfreeze a card in your hand.
AquaticMod:FieryFish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to NL ALL enemies twice. NL Unfreeze ALL the cards in your hand.

AquaticMod:FromBelow.NAME: From Below
AquaticMod:FromBelow.DESCRIPTION: Deep. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

AquaticMod:FrozenSolid.NAME: Frozen Solid
AquaticMod:FrozenSolid.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Plated Armor. NL Freeze this card.

AquaticMod:GoneFishin.NAME: Gone Fishin'
AquaticMod:GoneFishin.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, add a Hook into your hand.
AquaticMod:GoneFishin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, add an Upgraded Hook into your hand.

AquaticMod:HarpoonShot.NAME: Harpoon Shot
AquaticMod:HarpoonShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a random Attack from your draw pile into your hand.

AquaticMod:Hook.NAME: Hook
AquaticMod:Hook.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Return a card from your discard pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.
AquaticMod:Hook.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Return a card from your discard pile to your hand and Upgrade it for this combat. NL Exhaust.

AquaticMod:IcicleWall.NAME: Icicle Wall
AquaticMod:IcicleWall.DESCRIPTION: Freeze any number of cards in your hand. NL Gain !B! Block and NL !M! Thorns for each.

AquaticMod:InkCloud.NAME: Ink Cloud
AquaticMod:InkCloud.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Block if being attacked, and gain Entangled otherwise.
AquaticMod:InkCloud.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! Block if being attacked, and gain Entangled otherwise.

AquaticMod:JellySting.NAME: Jelly Sting
AquaticMod:JellySting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw cards until you have !M! in hand.

AquaticMod:KrakenGo.NAME: The Kraken
AquaticMod:KrakenGo.DESCRIPTION: Deep. NL Frozen. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [B] [B].

AquaticMod:Lagoon.NAME: Black Lagoon
AquaticMod:Lagoon.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, gain !M! Block.

AquaticMod:Lure.NAME: Lure
AquaticMod:Lure.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Thorns.

AquaticMod:Maelstrom.NAME: Maelstrom
AquaticMod:Maelstrom.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Swim X times. NL Exhaust.
AquaticMod:Maelstrom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Swim X+1 times. NL Exhaust.

AquaticMod:MineField.NAME: Minefield
AquaticMod:MineField.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! Mines to ALL enemies X times.

AquaticMod:MopUp.NAME: Mop Up
AquaticMod:MopUp.DESCRIPTION: Deep. NL If the target is at or below 50% HP, gain NL [B] and draw 1 card. NL Deal !D! damage.

AquaticMod:NetCast.NAME: Net Cast
AquaticMod:NetCast.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak and NL !M! Vulnerable. NL Gain Entangled.

AquaticMod:Nibble.NAME: Nibble
AquaticMod:Nibble.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain [B].
AquaticMod:Nibble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain [B] [B].

AquaticMod:Nuke.NAME: Ancient Nuke
AquaticMod:Nuke.DESCRIPTION: Frozen. NL Apply !M! Mines to a random enemy.

AquaticMod:DirtyBomb.NAME: Dirty Bomb
AquaticMod:DirtyBomb.DESCRIPTION: Apply 10 Mines. NL The next time you attack the enemy, Mines are not removed.
AquaticMod:DirtyBomb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 10 Mines. NL The next !M! times you attack the enemy, Mines are not removed.

AquaticMod:Patrol.NAME: Patrol
AquaticMod:Patrol.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a Depth Charge to the bottom of your draw pile.
AquaticMod:Patrol.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a Depth Charge+ to the bottom of your draw pile.

AquaticMod:Pearl.NAME: Pearl
AquaticMod:Pearl.DESCRIPTION: Deep. NL Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, gain [B].
AquaticMod:Pearl.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, gain [B].

AquaticMod:Rebreather.NAME: Rebreather
AquaticMod:Rebreather.DESCRIPTION: Deep. NL Gain [B] [B]. NL Add a Hook to NL your hand. NL Exhaust.
AquaticMod:Rebreather.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deep. NL Gain [B] [B] [B]. NL Add a Hook to NL your hand. NL Exhaust.

AquaticMod:Rejuvenate.NAME: Rejuvenate
AquaticMod:Rejuvenate.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain Block equal to your current Block. NL Exhaust.
AquaticMod:Rejuvenate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain Block equal to your current Block.

AquaticMod:RisingTides.NAME: Rising Tides
AquaticMod:RisingTides.DESCRIPTION: Put 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
AquaticMod:RisingTides.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your draw pile, then draw 1 card for each. NL Exhaust.

AquaticMod:RogueWave.NAME: Rogue Wave
AquaticMod:RogueWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to NL ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Swim.

AquaticMod:RopeLash.NAME: Rope Lash
AquaticMod:RopeLash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL A random Attack in your hand costs 0 until played.

AquaticMod:Sabotage.NAME: Sabotage
AquaticMod:Sabotage.DESCRIPTION: If the target is at or below 50% HP, it loses !M! Strength this turn.

AquaticMod:Shipwreck.NAME: Shipwreck
AquaticMod:Shipwreck.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put as many 0 cost cards from your draw pile into your hand as possible.

AquaticMod:ShrimpyStrike.NAME: Shrimpy Strike
AquaticMod:ShrimpyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, Upgrade this card permanently.

AquaticMod:SonarSweep.NAME: Sonar Sweep
AquaticMod:SonarSweep.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL You and ALL enemies gain 1 Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

AquaticMod:StoneAged.NAME: Stone Aged
AquaticMod:StoneAged.DESCRIPTION: Frozen. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When you draw this card, increase its damage by !M! this combat.

AquaticMod:SunkenChest.NAME: Sunken Chest
AquaticMod:SunkenChest.DESCRIPTION: Deep. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.
AquaticMod:SunkenChest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deep. NL Remove ALL your debuffs. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

AquaticMod:Surf.NAME: Surf
AquaticMod:Surf.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to NL ALL enemies. NL Trigger ALL NL your Swim.

AquaticMod:SquidForm.NAME: Squid Form
AquaticMod:SquidForm.DESCRIPTION: ALL Attacks cost 0. NL Whenever you play !M! Attacks in a turn, NL gain Entangled.

AquaticMod:TentacleSlap.NAME: Tentacle Slap
AquaticMod:TentacleSlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Entangled. NL Add a Hook into your hand.

AquaticMod:Typhoon.NAME: Typhoon
AquaticMod:Typhoon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies X times. NL Exhaust.
AquaticMod:Typhoon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies X times. NL Exhaust.

AquaticMod:UpToSpeed.NAME: Up To Speed
AquaticMod:UpToSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, draw !M! additional cards. Exhaust.

AquaticMod:Waterborn.NAME: Waterborne
AquaticMod:Waterborn.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Swim.

AquaticMod:Wrap.NAME: Wrap
AquaticMod:Wrap.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your Thorns !M! times.

AquaticMod:WringOut.NAME: Wring Out
AquaticMod:WringOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose ALL your Swim.

AquaticMod:YoHoHo.NAME: Yo Ho Ho
AquaticMod:YoHoHo.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL The next time you shuffle your draw pile, lose !M! Dexterity.
